titleStmt.title: A free-vvill offering, or, a Pillar of praise with a thankfull remembrance for the receit of mercies, in a long voyage, and happy arrivall. First preached in Fen-Church, the 7 of September, 1634. now published by the author, Samuel Hinde.
Free-will offering.
titleStmt.author: Hinde, Samuel, fl. 1634.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
